Control Name: 5.10.4 Secure modern hashing algorithms (SHA-2 family) are used.
Control Statement: Applications should use the SHA-2 family of hash algorithms (SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512).

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.10 How are you managing encryption for this workload?
